#Text=Make a Small Apartment Appear Larger
#Text=Have you ever felt that your apartment is too small ?
#Text=Or perhaps just smaller than you ’d like ?
#Text=There ’s no need to feel cramped – there are many tactics you can use to make a small apartment feel like a comfortable , cozy home .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Clear the clutter .
#Text=If you ’re struggling with a small space , the first step is to get organized !
#Text=When you have your belongings neatly arranged and out of sight , your space will feel orderly and open .
#Text=Try mounted wall shelves and storage ottomans to make the most of the space you have – anything that can pull double duty will help make your apartment feel more spacious and organized .
#Text=Decorate with soft , light hues .
#Text=Dark , warm colors are often used to make a home feel cozy and intimate , but these colors unfortunately also make rooms feel smaller .
#Text=To make your apartment feel larger , use light , cool colors for an open , airy effect .
#Text=Soft blues and greens are the most effective , but any light , cool color will add space to your apartment .
#Text=For the optimum effect , use a monochromatic color scale , and tie all your decorations into a specific color family .
#Text=If you can paint your apartment , make sure the walls are also painted in similarly light colors – light walls will have the largest effect on making the room feel larger .
#Text=Open up floor space .
#Text=Move furniture out of walkways , and remove unnecessary furniture .
#Text=A few large , useful pieces will help make your space feel larger and cozier .
#Text=Move tall furniture against the wall .
#Text=When you fill a room with multiple small pieces of furniture , the space begins to feel cramped and uninviting .
#Text=The end goal is to show as much floor as possible .
#Text=If new furniture is an option , invest in pieces that offer open space underneath , to make the room feel even larger .
#Text=Use light to your advantage .
#Text=Light-filled rooms will make your apartment feel much larger .
#Text=Choose accessories that emit and reflect light .
#Text=Floor and table lamps may take up too much space , but track lighting or wall-mounted sconces can provide extra light and elegance to a room .
#Text=Hang mirrors on walls that are opposite windows to reflect light into the space and provide extra oomph to the room – space will also be reflected , resulting in a room that feels larger .
#Text=Go in the attic and see which walls are supporting walls .
#Text=A wall that does not support anything can be removed to increase space .
#Text=Be prepared to redo the flooring afterwards .
#Text=Tips
#Text=By following these tactics for decorating a small space , your apartment home will feel comfortable and more spacious .
#Text=You ’ll have a creative space that suits all your needs , and lends a refined elegance to any events you hold in your home .
#Text=TGM Associates is an investment advisory firm with a focus on multifamily properties .

#Text=TGM acquires , sells and manages apartment properties throughout the U.S. TGM strives to provide the highest level of resident services and quality on-site management as part of a continual commitment to provide residents with a well-maintained apartment community and a comfortable place to live .
